body:
Ability to download workflow history & update workflow history into another namespace for devs to debug
Can also will help if user want to manually import workflow history

comments.body:
This is supported with AdminAPI ImportWorkflowExecution, or tdbg tool:
```
$ ./tdbg w import --help
NAME:
   tdbg workflow import - import workflow history to database

USAGE:
   tdbg workflow import [command options] [arguments...]

OPTIONS:
   --workflow-id value, --wid value  Workflow ID
   --run-id value, --rid value       Run ID
   --input-filename value            input file
   --help, -h                        show help (default: false)
```

title: Ability to download workflow history & update workflow history into a dev / test namespace
